blogPost.excerpt: Covering 249 countries, Canitravel.net helps international travelers navigate Coronavirus restrictions worldwide. Whether you're looking to repatriate, meet your loved one, or find safe travel destinations, you can plan your next trip with confidence.
blogPost.body: Covering 249 countries, Canitravel.net helps international travelers navigate Coronavirus restrictions worldwide. Whether you're looking to repatriate, meet your loved one, or find safe travel destinations, you can plan your next trip with confidence.
blogPost.title: Canitravel.net - Covid restrictions made simple – A new way to travel
blogPost.author: Fred Balzi

localize.description: Canitravel.net覆盖249个国家，帮助国际旅行者了解全球范围内的冠状病毒限制。无论您是想回国、与亲人相聚，还是寻找安全的旅行目的地，您都可以放心地计划您的下一次旅行。
localize.tagline: Covid的限制变得简单--一种新的旅行方式

localize.description: Canitravel.net覆蓋249個國家，幫助國際旅行者瞭解全球範圍內的冠狀病毒限制。無論您是想回國、與親人相聚，還是尋找安全的旅行目的地，您都可以放心地計劃您的下一次旅行。
localize.tagline: Covid的限制變得簡單--一種新的旅行方式

previous.excerpt: Mango Table is three-dimensional project management service. Our service focuses on expressing three-dimensional relationships, such as inclusion relationship, priority, etc, and visualizing projects in progress concurrently. Get more information from our https://mangotable.me.
previous.title: Mango Table - Visual, hierarchical, relationship-oriented project manager

localize.description: 芒果台是立体项目管理服务。我们的服务专注于表达三维关系，如包含关系、优先级等，并将同时进行的项目可视化。获取更多信息请访问我们的https://mangotable.me。
localize.tagline: 视觉化、层次化、关系型项目经理

localize.description: 芒果臺是立體項目管理服務。我們的服務專注於表達三維關係，如包含關係、優先級等，並將同時進行的項目可視化。獲取更多信息請訪問我們的https://mangotable.me。
localize.tagline: 視覺化、層次化、關係型項目經理

next.excerpt: Timedash combines your most vital daily information in one nifty widget: time, date, weather & a daily step counter, all available in one clear overview. Carefully designed with lots of attention to detail, Timedash is a must have widget for your Home Screen!
next.title: Timedash Widget - Combines your vital daily information into one nifty widget

localize.description: Timedash将您最重要的日常信息整合到一个小工具中：时间、日期、天气和每日步数，所有这些都在一个清晰的概述中提供。精心设计，注重细节，Timedash是你的主屏幕必备的小工具。
localize.tagline: 将您的重要日常信息整合到一个精美的小工具中

localize.description: Timedash將您最重要的日常信息整合到一個小工具中：時間、日期、天氣和每日步數，所有這些都在一個清晰的概述中提供。精心設計，注重細節，Timedash是你的主屏幕必備的小工具。
localize.tagline: 將您的重要日常信息整合到一個精美的小工具中
